name: Simulman 10: Pentagram
overview: Simulman 10: Pentagram is an Italian, action adventure game, developed and published by Simulmondo, which was released in Europe in 1994. Your character, Simulman a character based on a primary developer, named Venturi and Jim Morrison! You gain points through the elimination of who will try to kill you: each opponent killed will make you increase the score that will appear at the top of the screen. Along the way there are other apparently useless items that will increase your score to find and gather.
